sense.def:
A flash of light
je nenaden, kratek izbruh svetlobe.

seg.quote: Suddenly there was a flash of lightning.

sense.def:
Kadar luč
flashes
, nenadoma močno zasije.

seg.quote: I'll flash my headlights to make sure he sees us.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
flashes past someone
, se zelo hitro pomika mimo.

seg.quote: Something white flashed past the van.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
flashes through someone's mind
, se nenadoma in na kratko nečesa domislimo.

cit.quote: spreleteti, šiniti v glavo, pasti na pamet

seg.quote: It flashed through his mind that he might never get back.

sense.def:
To have a flash of intuition or insight
pomeni nenadoma nekaj spoznati.

To flash a look or a smile at someone
pomeni na hitro in za kratek čas nekoga pogledati ali se mu nasmehniti;

seg.quote: He flashed a conspiratorial grin at them.
